page.title: 05CLUBS
page.content: There are a variety of{clubs}in Port Glasgow.They cover many interests from political and religious to sport. Some of the{clubs}help people of many ages to socialise, such as the Port High Youth Club. Among the sports catered for with the clubs, are Golf(behind Devol),fishing, football.Also squash and badminton are catered for in the Community Centre. Among the social{clubs}are the Masonic Lodge and Upper Port Glasgow. Many of the chapels have their own{clubs.}The Town Hall provides facilities for Judo and a chess club.Also holding Flower shows and Fete. Among the religious societies are SPUC and the Pioneers who have a lot of support in the local area.
